posts.post_content:
Hello looking to move these two commons. 18.00 each or 32.00 delivered for the pair. Would also trade for a T206 of Wagner (Boston) in Gd/Vg condition. Scans are in the FS/FT section under my signature.

Myers  Sweet Cap  Fair

Oldring  Sweet Cap  Trim but very presentable

Bump for price drop. $15.00 each or $25.00 for the pair.
                                         Thanks,
                                           Steve
